Scan Invoice, Upload to Website, Managed IT and support services Let us manage your technology so you can stay focused Get the most out of your Standard and custom training services for individuals OUR SERVICES To help your business reap the full potential of your accounting / ERP software applications, we offer the following services that fit with your business needs. Rapid implementations delivered on time and within budget Your accounting software is only as good as the data it holds Data import and export from accounting software made easy Managed IT and support services to simplify your IT management Scan, upload and import invoices online from the cloud to your accounting system Training Services Get the most out of your accounting / ERP software CONSULTING SERVICES We offer a full range of services covering both business and technology areas to help you to select, implement and manage your accounting / ERP software applications. Although most of our services involve software applications, we have qualified business professionals to assist you in the areas of accounting, manufacturing/production, operations, and sales & marketing. New Company – Accounting / ERP Custom Software Development Special Projects / System Integration Temporary / Permanent Business Intelligence Custom Reports Data Repair Accounting Data Backup Technical Support – On-site Technical Support SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS We are a solutions consulting organization with the expertise and experience to recommend the right accounting / ERP software based on a thorough assessment of the client’s business requirements. We have relationships with a wide range of vendors to help you choose the right solution. Our expertise covers the following areas : Enterprise Resource Planning Accounting Customer Relationship Management (CRM) eCommerce Manufacturing Business Intelligence & Reporting Electronic Data Interchange Service & Maintenance Warehouse Management Learn how we can help your business Call Us Today Stay Connected Join our Monthly Newsletter We bring you valuable business insights and the latest industry news. ▼
